content.rendered:
The Mimosa B5 backhaul radio is, hands down, the easiest to use and highest capacity unlicensed 5 GHz
backhaul solution for short and mid-range link applications. It’s ideal for collocation applications, relay sites, and
building-to-building settings.

  Features

  • Bandwidth – Single or Dual 20/40/80 MHz channels
  • Max throughput – 1.5GBps
  • Frequency Range – 5150-5875
  • Max Output power – 30 dBm
  • Gain – 25 dBi
  • Max Power consumption – 20W
  • Polarization – Dual or Linear
